transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir, bataiye.
Executive: Sir India Mart se bol rahe hai ye?
Customer: Haan ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Hello
Executive: Haan sir bataiye mujhe mera mera package tha India Mart pe sir India station next year.
Customer: Sir mai ek minute me call karta hu aapko just ek minute dijiye meeting me tha ek minute.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has a package with IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive said will call back in a minute.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in a minute.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- package, call back
